Title: EasyBB
Description: Easy DP is an open source bulletin board system on Windows Platform. It is aimed to be the best bulletin board system ever and highly scalable and extensible matches any business need. It is developed with latest technologies on .NET Framework, e.g. MVC, Razor, EF, Silverlight...
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Easy DP is an open source bulletin board system on Windows Platform. It is aimed to be the best bulletin board system ever and highly scalable and extensible matches any business need. It is developed with latest technologies on .NET Framework, e.g. MVC, Razor, EF, Silverlight...


!!Looking for Help
I just started modeling EasyBB. I am looking for people who want to help with the development. Help is not limited to coding but all aspects regarding this project. E.g. you could provide ideas or features you want a bulletin board system to have or current existing projects lack. This is a serious project which is going to be a complete and professional solution like phpBB in PHP open source community. Any help is appreciated.
